incidents.name: Issue with Twilio helper libraries

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue with Twilio helper libraries and are working to deploy a fix. Current workaround is using go: v1.19.0 https://github.com/twilio/twilio-go/releases/tag/v1.19.0, node: 4.23.0 https://www.npmjs.com/package/twilio/v/4.23.0, python: 8.13.0, java: 9.16.0 https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/com.twilio.sdk/twilio/9.16.0, c#: 6.18.0 https://www.nuget.org/packages/Twilio/6.18.0. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours as engineering will be fixing the issue in the next release.

Engineers continue to investigate a service interruption with Python helper library release 9.0.0.  Customers can't use the latest version of the helper library for certain requests. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating a service interruption with Python helper library release 9.0.0.  Customers can't use the latest version of the helper library for certain requests. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Python helper library release 9.0.0 . Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Verify experienced a degradation on the Verification creation endpoint given an increased latency.

incident_updates.body:
On March 13th, between 18:19:11 UTC and 01:19:38, Verify experienced a degradation on the Verification creation endpoint given an increased latency.
Customer Impact: 343 errors (i.e., 503) were returned to customers.  The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: SMS Failures to Greece Cosmote

incident_updates.body: Twilio SMS was degraded for 72 hours between 03/09/2024 and 03/11/2024. During this time, customers may have experienced SMS failures to Greece Cosmote with error codes 21703 and 21612. The issue has now been resolved.
